title: Voyage Around My Dad, Harry Leslie Smith
subtitle: A few weeks before his death, in Nov 2018, my dad, Harry Leslie Smith was preparing to go to Paris to meet refugees abandoned  on the streets of the city of lights like unwanted cats. "I want to tell them not to give up hope b/c I know help will come." #WorldKindnessDaypic.twitter.com/W2hLZeJIKk

title: Emma Flynn
subtitle: This morning in Whole Class Reading, we read the poem ‘Refugees’ by Brian Bilston. About 20 minutes into the lesson, we read it from the bottom and Year 6 were amazed.
